welcome_message_body: Welcome to Zaragoza, where the enchanting blend of historic architecture and vibrant culture awaits you. Known for its stunning Basilica del Pilar and delicious tapas, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all the city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: La Guadalupana
restaurants.description: La Guadalupana is a mexican restaurant located in Zaragoza.

restaurants.name: La flor
restaurants.description: La flor is a seafood restaurant located in Cosoleacaque.

restaurants.name: Mariscos Las Almejas
restaurants.description: Mariscos Las Almejas is a seafood restaurant located in Cosoleacaque.

restaurants.name: Resturant Kafito
restaurants.description: Resturant Kafito is a restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Tlayudas El Naranjito
restaurants.description: Tlayudas El Naranjito is a mexican restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zaragoza Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be limited in some areas.
